attributes.action: Instruct the police to investigate all politicians' expenses for fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much of the expenses scandal amounts to nothing less than fraud - a prisonable offense. Those honest and innocent MPs will get their opportunity to clear their names whilst the guilty go to prison, which is what any thief would have to do when caught.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
